quantityOfCurrentMeal: The quantity of this dish for the customer
allCustomersAssigned: All customers assigned to a meal
noOrdersForCurrentWeekDescription: There are no orders for this week. Click the 'Week plans' button in the menu bar to create and publish a new week plan to see all orders. You can also change the week to view previous orders.
noOrdersForCurrentDayDescription: There are no orders for the selected day. Click the 'Week plans' button in the menu bar and add the desired dishes to the corresponding day in the 'weekly menu'.
noMealsForSelectedMealsCategoryDescripti: There are no meals for the selected category. Try selecting a different category.
unmarkAsDoneModalDescription: Are you sure you want to mark this order as not done?
markAsDoneModalDescription: Are you sure you want to mark this order as done?
mealAlreadyHasThisStatus: The meal is already in this status
